text.value: The business-key of the process execution
The user-task-id of the process execution

Please type in the project identifier ({project-identifier-placeholder}) to confirm the release of the data-set for the data management site. Beforehand, please make sure that a DocumentReference with the project identifier as masterIdentifier and a FHIR resource as attachment of the DocumentReference are readable on the KDS FHIR store with base-url {kds-store-base-url-placeholder}.
